snippet: After decades of legal contortions and disputes over ownership, it has returned home and will be put on public display in September to mark the bicentenary of the Marquis de Sade’s death.
abstract: After decades of legal contortions and disputes over ownership, it has returned home and will be put on public display in September to mark the bicentenary of the Marquis de Sade’s death.

headline.main: Marquis de Sade Manuscript Returns to France
